SettingsActivity

Website
You will need to grant permissions for this app to access Line notifications.
Disable Power Optimization
Update
Please confirm you would like to delete the cached friend names?
Delete
Highly recommend to update the \"Message notifications\" setting to \"Silent\"
Please remember to update the \"Message notifications\" setting back to \"Alert\"
Go to Settings
LINE Messages
LINE Calls
Notifications
Other Settings
Identical messages
Start conversations
Show a special notification that can be used to start conversations by replying with a message that starts with a configured keyword.
Do not show the special notification.
Show my responses sent from my watch

Show my responses sent from my watch in notifications. Useful to track your conversations and if you have responded. Note that the notification will be shown even if LINE FAILS to send the actual message and you may need to confirm through the LINE app.
Do not show my responses sent from my watch in notifications.
Legacy sticker loader
Use the old sticker loader. Use this option only if the stickers are not showing.
Use the up-to-date sticker loader.
Split large messages
Split large messages into multiple notifications.
Do not split large messages into multiple notifications.
Message size limit
Max number of pages of split messages
Continuous call notifications
Receive multiple notifications during incoming calls to prevent missing notifications.
Receive one notification during incoming call.
When to stop auto call notifications?
Duration in between continuous call notifications
Incoming call action order
Show "Decline" then "Answer". Use this option when you tend to decline calls more often.
Show "Answer" then "Decline". Use this option when you tend to answer calls more often.
Bluetooth control during calls

Disable Bluetooth during calls. There is a known LINE bug where the volume is very low during video calls when connected to Samsung Watches. You can update this setting through Tasker (details on website).
Do nothing during calls. You can update this setting through Tasker (details on website).
Manage Notification Settings
Change settings such as sound, vibration, and pop-ups.
[BETA] Manage LINE notifications
Use LINE Notification Support to handle LINE messages. LINE messages will be automatically dismissed.
Do not mess with LINE notifications
Auto dismiss notifications
Dismiss notifications from LINE Notification Support when LINE notifications are dismissed
Do not dismiss notifications from LINE Notification Support when LINE notifications are dismissed
Merge message notification channels
Single notification channel for messages. Calls will have a separate notification channel. Useful if you\'d like to set the same notification sound for all messages.
Multiple notification channels for messages. You can set different notification sounds for each chat and even mute the ones you don\'t really care.
Use a single notification for each conversation
A conversation can contain up to 10 previous messages. Easier to see the conversation history and also supports long messages without splitting. Highly recommend Samsung watches to try this option.
Use the traditional notification mechanism where each message will have a new notification.
[BETA] Workaround Android notification limit. Android 10 has a limit of 25 notifications per app while older Android versions have a limit of 50.

This option holds notifications when exceeding the limit and resends them when slots are available after notifications being dismissed. This is a new feature and may have bugs. Please keep your active notification count low if possible.
This is the default Android behavior. You will not receive any notifications from this app if you exceed the limit.
Optimize Power Settings

It is highly recommended to disable power optimization for both LINE and LINE Notification Support. With power optimization, LINE will miss messages or fail to send responses through your watch. Similarly LINE Notification support may not successfully forward notifications from LINE.
Delete Cached Friend Names
Use this option when your friends change their names causing notifications to show out-dated ones.

This LINE version (10.19.1) you are using does not provide the title of the chat group. Instead of showing the title of the chat group, this app will list out the users who previously responded as a mitigation. If not showing the title is a problem, please downgrade your LINE version to 10.18.2 or 10.19.2 and above.
BIG thanks for supporting this app!
Author: Rick Wang (linenotificationapp@gmail.com)"
Find or suggest recommended settings in our website!
This is an open source project! Feel free to contribute! https://github.com/rickwangtw/LineNotificationSupport"

No messages from LINE received previously so you cannot start a conversation. A list of available chat will be shown here after you receive LINE messages.
